extendedInfo.description: Now available for android devices after huge success in apple.Designed by physicians, USMLE Step 3 smartcards are a perfect way to review USMLE Step 3 on the move.These cards are more than just flashcards as they help study topics by sorting between Easy and difficult cards.This app enable you to pin cards that you need to revise making it easier to go back to difficult topics.This version includes over 1000 essential USMLE style questions and answers.Also includes CCS questions.Other features include* Teaching mode - Lets you see the question and answer together or turn it off to see only Questions then simply swipe on the screen to view answer.* Resources - Direct links to USMLE sites relevant to Step 3Now available on android devices on demand after huge success on Apple

reviews.title: Basic
reviews.comment: Where are the hard questions? Anybody who is seriously studying for step 3, the questions here are seemingly too basic. Ok for just quickly going through factual information. The questions are not USMLE exam style. You might start with this to keep your brain from forgetting facts after your Step 2 exam. But can\'t see this questions being too helpful for the actual exam.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like the app and its content..The CCS part is very useful that i could not find anywhere else.
reviews.author: A Google User
